# parameterID

**Instance Property**

The dynamic parameter ID defining the type of parameter being modified.

## Declaration

```swift
var parameterID: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID { get }
```

## Specifying a Dynamic Parameter’s Value

- **relativeTime**: The time at which this dynamic parameter is applied, relative to the start time of the pattern.
- **value**: The value of the dynamic parameter.
